title: Maqluba
description: A famous Levantine dish of layered rice, meat, and vegetables, cooked together and flipped upside down before serving.
instructions: Slice and fry eggplants and potatoes until lightly golden.
Boil the chicken with spices and salt until cooked.
In a large pot, layer cooked chicken, fried vegetables, then rice.
Add broth until it covers the rice.
Cook on low heat for 40 minutes.
Let rest 10 minutes, then flip the pot onto a tray and serve.
